name: Reflex (itch) (developerdjay)
description:
A tiny addictive game with a high skill ceiling and plenty of room for mastery.

Compatible with PC and MOBILE!

Controls
- Mobile: Use finger
- Computer: Use mouse / trackpad / spacebar

Gameplay
- Click or drag to get points from the orbs
- Clicks generate more orbs
- You have 10 seconds to get the highest score you can
